Package it.escape.core.server.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessagingHead  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnouncerObserverTest  
    AsyncUserListener
    The purpose of this object is to asynchronously monitor all the messages coming from a specific user, and act accordingly.
    ExecutiveController
    This class will host the actual turnHandlers, in which the turn logic is executed.
    GameMaster
    Responsibilities: 1) If a new user connects: a)bind his message interface to a Player b)add him to the Player List of a GameMaster object c)tell the GameMap to place a new Player d)tell the AnnouncerStrings to announce that a new Player has connected 2) Handle the disconnection of a Player, depending on the current state of the game (started/in progress/finished).
    GameMasterTest  
    Shorthand
    Static class used to shadow long and unwieldy method chains
    TimeController
    This class will organize the timing of a single active game: the turn succession, the timing, the game ending.
    TurnHandler
    This class defines the order of execution of the various methods that are invoked during a turn.
    TurnHandlerAlien  
    TurnHandlerAlienTest  
    TurnHandlerHuman  
    TurnHandlerHumanTest  
    UserMessagesReporter
    Abstract user messages reporter, it holds the static logic which enroutes player<-->messagingChannel.
    UserMessagesReporterRMI  
    UserMessagesReporterSocket
    This class is located at the border of the controller package, it communicates with the classes inside the View; This class statically links a player in the game to a MessagingChannelStrings, thus automatically routing any user-specific communications.
    VictoryAnnounce
    Auxiliary class to prevent code repetition in GameMaster
    VictoryChecker  
    VictoryCheckerTest
